titleStmt.title: An excellent treatise teaching howe to cure the French-pockes with all other diseases arising and growing thereof, and in a manner all other sicknesses. Dravvne out of the bookes of that learned doctor and prince of phisitians, Theophrastus Paracelsus. Compiled by the learned Phillippus Hermanus, phisition and chirurgion. And now put into English by Iohn Hester in the spagiricall arte, practitioner.
titleStmt.author: Paracelsus, 1493-1541.

titleStmt.title: An excellent treatise teaching howe to cure the French-pockes with all other diseases arising and growing thereof, and in a manner all other sicknesses. Dravvne out of the bookes of that learned doctor and prince of phisitians, Theophrastus Paracelsus. Compiled by the learned Phillippus Hermanus, phisition and chirurgion. And now put into English by Iohn Hester in the spagiricall arte, practitioner.
titleStmt.author: Paracelsus, 1493-1541.
Hermanni, Philippus.
Hester, John, d. 1593.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by John Hester, of the German by Paracelsus.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
